alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 3:06AM EST until February 04 at 10:51AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Lilburn affecting Gwinnett County. For the Yellow River Basin...including Lilburn...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek near Lilburn. * WHEN...Until late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in portions of the Northwood Country Club Golf Course upstream from the gage on Club Drive...and in the woodland areas downstream from the gage and for the next four miles until the creek merges with the Yellow River. An old concrete golf cart bridge around 300 feet downstream from the gage will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
